name: Textarea
description: A simple textarea component that allows you to input multi-line text.

props.name: value
props.description: The current value of the textarea.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text displayed when the textarea is empty.

props.name: rows
props.description: Number of visible text lines for the textarea.

props.name: cols
props.description: Number of visible character columns for the textarea.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the textarea will be disabled.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback function when the value of the textarea changes.

props.name: autoResize
props.description: If true, the textarea will automatically adjust its height based on the content.

props.name: maxLength
props.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in the textarea.
